definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate
Minister of Education/Director of Education Department
multimedia education/abbr. to 電教|电教

sentences.english: In most cases, it is a good idea to include them.
sentences.chinese: 大部分情況下，把教育時間寫進去是個好主意。

sentences.english: Mr Charles was elected (the) chairman of the municipal education committee.
sentences.chinese: 查爾斯當選爲先生市教育委員會主任委員。

sentences.english: Now she is a teacher of Diligent Education, teaching middle school students, mainly engaged in teaching English.
sentences.chinese: 現是用心教育中學部老師，主要從事英語的教學。

sentences.english: But just 9 percent of those who use M.I.T. OpenCourseWare are educators.
sentences.chinese: 但是隻有9%使用麻省理工開放課程的網友是教育者。

sentences.english: Teacher is a key factor in actualizing education for quality.
sentences.chinese: 教師是實施素質教育的關鍵因素。

sentences.english: Popularization of compulsory pre-school education should be given priority.
sentences.chinese: 義務教育應優先提高學前教育。

sentences.english: Popularization of compulsory pre-school education should be given priority.
sentences.chinese: 義務教育應優先提高學前教育。

sentences.english: Education and knowledge has close inner relationship.
sentences.chinese: 教育與知識有着血肉相連的內在關係。

sentences.english: We can access educational resources and conduct research wherever there is Wi-Fi.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以在有無線網時搜索教育資源。

sentences.english: Men also receive health education and testing that could save their life.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏男士還接受一些可以救命的健康教育和檢查。

sentences.english: Progress in health care and education reform.
sentences.chinese: 醫療衛生和教育改革的進展。

sentences.english: Won the "Sama educate award" in the area of garments industry.
sentences.chinese: 獲紡織服裝領域“桑麻教育獎”。

sentences.english: Technology makes distance-education have more development space.
sentences.chinese: 技術使遠程教育有了更大的發展空間。

sentences.english: How should we evaluate China's educational work in the first 17 years?
sentences.chinese: 對全國教育戰線十七年的工作怎樣估計？

sentences.english: Nancy was working in the administration, too, on education.
sentences.chinese: 南希也在政府裏從事教育方面的工作。

sentences.english: Financial college students' quality education has its special inner regularity.
sentences.chinese: 財經類專業大學生的素質教育有其獨特的內在規律性。

definition: all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
early education (abbr. for 早期教育[zao3 qi1 jiao4 yu4])
preschool education/abbr. for 幼兒教育|幼儿教育[you4 er2 jiao4 yu4]
